data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Al Fayyum, Egypt honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Fayyum, Egypt

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 136,652 believers in Al Fayyum against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 22 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Al Fayyum, Egypt who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Al Fayyum, Egypt.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Al Fayyum to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Over 86.87 percent of the people of Al Fayyum are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Al Fayyum, Egypt that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

location.name: Al Fayyum
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Arabic Gulf Spoken, Bedouin, Levantine, Baharia, Wahati, Nubian, Fedicca-Mohas, Arab, Yemeni
